transArray.content: The hotel is very clean. It is close to the school and feels safe. The location is great. The room can be operated very smartly with a small speed. There is also a cute little robot that delivers food. There is also delicious coffee at the front desk of the hotel. I highly recommend this hotel and it is worth the money!
Your compliment is better than the sunshine, and your affirmation is better than the blooming flowers. We look forward to your stay again.
